name: Missiles Space Assault
description:
DESCRIPTION

Looking for an endless adventure in space? Look no further than this free casual game! Take on the role of an astronaut piloting your very own spaceship through the treacherous depths of the cosmos. Collect coins as you fly, unlocking new and improved spaceships along the way. But beware, danger lurks around every corner in the form of homing missiles seeking to destroy you.

Your objective is simple: survive for as long as possible, dodging and avoiding the incoming missiles to stay alive. Use power-ups such as shields and speed boosts to give yourself an edge and rack up points by colliding missiles with one another. 

Can you survive the endless waves of missiles and become the ultimate space adventurer?

CONTROL

The game was developed for mobile devices. That's why you have to:

- Use your MOUSE to interact with HUD elements;

- Use ARROW BUTTONS to control a spaceship and dodge left/right;

- Press 'F' to fullscreen.
